ai-mil5.1.10:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil5.1.10:1.2_0: ‘The four bases of psychic power have been developed and cultivated, made them a vehicle and a basis, kept them up, consolidated them, and properly implemented them.’
ai-mil5.1.10:1.4_0: ‘When three months have passed, the Realized One will finally be extinguished.’
ai-mil5.1.10:1.5_0: the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil5.1.10:1.6_1: Your abode is wrong, and there are wrong for you.
ai-mil5.1.10:1.7_0: If the Realized One says this:
ai-mil5.1.10:1.9_0: he can find no place in the Realized One.
ai-mil5.1.10:1.10_0: was this Buddha awakened for themselves;
ai-mil5.1.10:1.11_0: This questions on both sides, a profound, hard to comprehend, so hard to comprehend theoretically, attained to views, debates, settles down the doctrine of others.”
ai-mil5.1.10:2.1_0: “As indeed it is so very fruitful and beneficial. ...”
ai-mil5.1.10:2.1_1: Or they are called ‘The abode of many eons’ beliefs, opposite sex’.
ai-mil5.1.10:2.2_0: Yet the Buddha never powerfully say this:
ai-mil5.1.10:2.3_0: ‘The four bases of psychic power have been developed and cultivated or cultivated.’
ai-mil5.1.10:3.1_0: You’d say: ‘Great king, the royal thoroughbred slaughtered the forest with jungle thickets, wields, shook the sword, digning it from the carts, or its troops, its sheets, goats, and huges; it wouldn’t be appropriate for the assembly to show that one.’
ai-mil5.1.10:3.2_0: so too, the Buddha spoke to his own psychic powers. But he sat down on the ground with psychic powers that are the six classes of rebirth. And he sat down on the grounds for gods, thinking,
ai-mil5.1.10:3.3_0: ‘The four bases of psychic power have been developed and cultivated, made them a vehicle and a basis, kept them up, consolidated them, and properly implemented them.’
ai-mil5.1.10:3.4_0: But it’s possible that the Buddha’s powers of psychic powers has been capable of realizing anything that can be seen by the Buddha, and there is no place of his psychic power for the sake of this assembly.
ai-mil5.1.10:3.6_0: ‘Just as if a secret pile of dung is clean,
ai-mil5.1.10:3.7_0: In the same way, when I am tiny with psychic powers, even if I do not see a finger-snap. Would you be able to obtain psychic power by psychic power?”
ai-mil5.1.10:3.9_0: “Well then, great king, show the psychic powers of the Buddha who have psychic power.”
ai-mil5.1.10:3.10_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
ai-mil5.1.10:4.1_0: the One of Psychic Powers, whose mind is folk (magical) power,
ai-mil5.1.10:5.1_0: The first sub-chapter on psychic powers is finished.
ai-mil5.1.10:6.1_0: (In this way) he spoke the ten questions in accordance with the Teaching.
